title: Around Us Ent announces new group name for former B2ST! | allkpop.com
text: Or Login / Register With Us Forgot Password? Remember Me Around Us Ent announces new group name for former B2ST! By elliefilet 6 minutes ago 2,992 172 0 3 SEE ALSO: B2ST's Around Us Entertainment building puts up new logo! On February 24, the agency created by the 5 idols announced, "Label artists Doojoon, Junhyung, Yoseob, Kikwang, Dongwoon formerly known by the name B2ST will be starting anew under the new name Highlight . It's a new start, and we're nervous and careful about it. It's been 9 years since we debuted as a singer, but we'll cast aside our former glory for a new beginning." The agency further stated Highlight are aiming to see their fans on stage soon.As previously reported, the "former" B2ST members created the agency Around Us Entertainment . However, Cube Entertainment has announced that Hyunseung will be creating a new B2ST with two more unrevealed members . 'Highlight' is also the name of Cube Entertainment B2ST's final album.What do you think of the name Highlight?
